name: base-microservice
description: Javascript microservice abstraction layer: comunication based on Jesus + Schema Manager

scripts.watch_test: nodemon  --ext js --exec "clear && printf '\e[3J' && tap tests/*.test.js --cov --color --reporter=spec || true"
scripts.watch_debug: nodemon  --ext js  --cov --exec "clear && printf '\e[3J' && node --inspect   tests/base.test.js || true"
